summary: A pack of custom lore friendly music for modders and experienced players
descriptionHtml:
06/12 - Want these musics in your game ? Check out the amazing Fantasy Soundtrack project : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46518
It's a very cool and awesome compilation. Thanks to AceeQ on that one ;)



Music for modders


Description :
This is a pack of lore friendly music. By lore friendly music I mean :
- No inappropriate instruments, only strings, winds, brass and choirs with high level realism
- Appropriate orchestration : I tried to be close to Jeremy Soule's soundtrack

The pack is mainly aimed at modders that want unique music for their mods ( I take requests as well, PM me ).
As provided, the musics are in 16 or 24bits WAV format, so you'll have to convert them to xwm ( Skyrim Audio Converter can do that ).
If you are experienced with modding, and just want these music in your game, you can use Personalized Music, but I will not provide any support for that.

Music list (+ previews ) :

=> Skt_amb3 : This is a simple piece, with harp and soft strings/winds, mixing both Morrowind and Skyrim themes, plus some of my own melodies. https://soundcloud.com/creepyskyrim/faal-feykro

=> Skt_amb4 : Soft choirs/strings/bells track. Would fit in a night scene.

=> Skt_amb5 : an harp cover of Peaceful Waters from Morrowind ( I believe you can hear it in the
Dragonborn DLC too ). Very ambiant. https://soundcloud.com/creepyskyrim/fen-kos-drem

=>Skt_amb6 : Soft choirs and strings, some winds too. Very atmospheric. https://soundcloud.com/creepyskyrim/a-night-in-hjaalmarch

=>Skt_amb7 : Bass/tenor choirs. Also very ambiant/atmospheric, really Skyrim-ish. https://soundcloud.com/creepyskyrim/dark-mountains


=>Skt_castle1 : Fitting music for a Jarl's palace. https://soundcloud.com/creepyskyrim/longue-vie-au-jarl

=>Skt_CivilWar : Fight for your city. Or against it. Hard Orchestra, loud percussion. You may want to reduce the volume on that one before putting it into the game. https://soundcloud.com/creepyskyrim/zin-ahrk-dwiin

=>Skt_town3 : Peaceful town. Pizzicato cellos.

Bonus : warning, these are less lore friendly. These are based on the hobbit theme ( could still fit Skyrim thought )
Second warning, youtube preview's audio quality is crap.

Hobbit : A main theme. Epic.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eFL_Xt4MmbU

Hobbit_misty sovngard : Sovngard-ish. Enjoy. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1V5Xd5BeFkY

Hobbit intro : soft version of the main theme http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gvfO-D38xoc

I COMPOSED, PRODUCED AND MIXED ALL THESE MUSICS. THEY ARE FREE. YOU CAN USE THEM IN ANY NON-COMMERCIAL PROJECT. JUST LEAVE IN THE README : "Music by CaptainCreepy : https://www.facebook.com/CaptainCreepyMusic"

Please, if you enjoyed listening to these musics, take a moment to listen to my other work :
https://soundcloud.com/captaincreepy
captaincreepy.bandcamp.com
And like the Facebook page for all me music news : https://www.facebook.com/CaptainCreepyMusic

Oh, and I will post others packs. I just don't know when. And remember that I take requests.
author: CaptainCreepy
